courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing from chords to simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced skills like arpeggios and complex harmonies on piano.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn how to improvise in jazz with scales, licks, and real-time techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: An essential course for understanding the building blocks of music.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Produce electronic music using DAWs like Ableton Live and FL Studio.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Get started with rhythm, stick techniques, and basic drum patterns.

courses.title: Singing Essentials
courses.description: Improve your voice, pitch, breathing, and control through guided vocal exercises.

courses.title: Composing for Film
courses.description: Create evocative scores and soundtracks for visual media.

courses.title: Ukulele Quick Start
courses.description: A fast-track course to get you strumming and playing songs on the ukulele.

courses.title: Fingerstyle Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Refine your fingerpicking technique for acoustic guitar brilliance.

courses.title: Classical Music Appreciation
courses.description: Discover the history and beauty of classical compositions and composers.

courses.title: Beatmaking with MPC
courses.description: Master rhythm sequencing and beat design using MPC hardware.

courses.title: Intro to Songwriting
courses.description: Write compelling lyrics and melodies in this beginner songwriting course.

courses.title: DJ Mixing Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn how to mix tracks, beatmatch, and perform live DJ sets.

courses.title: Violin for Beginners
courses.description: Learn how to hold, tune, and play simple songs on the violin.
